    • addPipe

      public void addPipe(L pipeLabel, Simulatable<L> pipe) throws BipartiteGraphException
      Throws:
      BipartiteGraphException
      Modifies:
      this
      Effects:
      Adds a new pipe to the system. throws BipartiteGraphException in the following cases: - one of the arguments is null - filter or pipe with the same label already exists

    • addFilter

      Throws:
      BipartiteGraphException
      Modifies:
      this
      Effects:
      Adds a new filter to the system. throws BipartiteGraphException in the following cases: - one of the arguments is null - filter or pipe with the same label already exists

      public void simulate() throws BipartiteGraphException
      Throws:
      BipartiteGraphException
      Modifies:
      This.
      Effects:
      Simulates a single step of the system, for all pipes and filters.

      Effects:
